objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor panel with smooth non-reflective surface in light gray finish, providing ample walking space around the demo car and all booth elements.
A tall vertical wall panel with smooth neutral finish to define the booth perimeter and provide a backdrop for branding.

A realistic scaled sports car model with glossy finish, aerodynamic body shape, detailed wheels and windows, colored in vibrant red with black accents, positioned for optimal viewing from all sides without collisions.
A rectangular reception desk with clean lines, smooth white finish, integrated front panel for branding, suitable height for staff and visitor interactions.
A contemporary square coffee table with a smooth wood surface and slender metal legs, sized for casual lounge seating.
A modern lounge chair with sleek curved lines, low profile upholstery in neutral fabric and thin metal legs, oriented toward the table or the demo car.
